plot: The Sweet Science follows Roy Jones Jr as he trains to fight John Ruiz for the WBA Heavyweight Championship of the World.
title: The Sweet Science
plot_es: The Sweet Science follows Roy Jones Jr as he trains to fight John Ruiz for the WBA Heavyweight Championship of the World.
plot_en: The Sweet Science follows Roy Jones Jr as he trains to fight John Ruiz for the WBA Heavyweight Championship of the World.
